item.description: This one's easy: Ascutney in autumn. It's always good! My preference this time around is the Windsor Trail, as I have not yet walked that one, but I am open to going one of the other routes. Beer at the brewery afterward to celebrate our achievement - and because there is no better end to a hike than a couple tasty pints. http://www.vtstateparks.com/pdfs/ascutney_rec_guide.pdf

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Mt. Ascutney
